name: Boundo
headline: Using generative AI to 10x outbound sales, all on autopilot!
description: Boundo uses generative AI to replace SDRs. Tell our platform who you're looking for, and it will find and contact high quality sales leads in a fully automated way! We‚Äôve tuned our models to write near-human outbound sales emails with proven conversion. Best of all, we're using our own tool to do all of our sales.

founders.name: Simar Kohli, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and CEO of Boundo - we're automating the sales process using Generative AI!

founders.name: Samik Shrotriya, Founder
founders.description: Recent Cornell University graduate working on automating outbound sales processes!

raw_markdown='[Boundo](https://boundo.com/</> "Home")
Backed by Y Combinator, Spice Capital, Dharmesh Shah, and more
Features
[Pricing](https://boundo.com/</pricing>)
[Case studies](https://boundo.com/</casestudies>)
# The best AI sales rep for enterprise.
Boundo is the best-in-class AI sales rep - working 24/7/365 to generate leads and close deals.
[Get selling](https://boundo.com/<https:/cal.com/simar-kohli>)[See pricing](https://boundo.com/</pricing>)
![Plannerly](https://boundo.com/customers/plannerly.png)![Unthread](https://boundo.com/customers/unthreadio.png)![Wilderness Labs](https://boundo.com/customers/wildernesslabs.webp)![Cyble](https://boundo.com/customers/cyblelogo.png)![Echoes](https://boundo.com/customers/echoeshq.webp)
## Numbers
### Proven performance at scale.
Saved per SDR
    1000 hours
Avg savings, annually
    $70000
In deals closed
    $150000+
Uplift in response rate
    $1x
## A month of outbound scheduled in seconds.
## Sales
### Sell at the speed of light.
![](https://boundo.com/screenshots/boundo/chatBubble.png)
### Speed
Chat with Boundo
Tell Boundo your ICP and watch as thousands of qualified leads are generated in seconds. Or, upload your own lead list to Boundo.
### Limitless
LinkedIn and email
Watch as Boundo works its magic across multiple channels - reacting/commenting to posts, connecting with leads on LinkedIn, and running smart email sequences.
GmailOutlook
### Health
Ensure deliverability
Boundo ensures that your emails are delivered by using the latest in email deliverability technology.
![](https://boundo.com/logo-cluster/career-builder.svg)![](https://boundo.com/logo-cluster/dribbble.svg)![](https://boundo.com/logo-cluster/glassdoor.svg)![](https://boundo.com/logo-cluster/linkedin.svg)![](https://boundo.com/logo-cluster/upwork.svg)![](https://boundo.com/logo-cluster/we-work-remotely.svg)
### Source
Reach 300 million leads
Boundo finds data across some of the best database providers out there, including Apollo, Zoominfo, Lusha, Lemlist, Coresignal, and more.
![](https://boundo.com/map/1.jpg)
![](https://boundo.com/map/2.jpg)
![](https://boundo.com/map/3.jpg)
![](https://boundo.com/map/4.jpg)
![](https://boundo.com/map/5.jpg)
### Intent
Track hot leads üî•
Boundo tracks leads that are engaging with your content, so you can focus on the leads that are most likely to convert.
## Outreach
### Customer outreach has never been easier.
### Messaging
Best-in-class AI Personalization
Boundo uses the latest in AI to personalize your outreach, ensuring that your leads feel like they're being spoken to by a human.
![](https://boundo.com/logo-timeline/hubspot.svg)Hubspot
![](https://boundo.com/logo-timeline/boundo/salesforce-2.svg)Salesforce
![](https://boundo.com/logo-timeline/boundo/zoho.png)Zoho
![](https://boundo.com/logo-timeline/boundo/copper-logo.png)Copper
![](https://boundo.com/logo-timeline/boundo/keap.svg)Keap
![](https://boundo.com/logo-timeline/boundo/pipedrive.svg)Pipedrive
![](https://boundo.com/logo-timeline/boundo/afinity.png)Afinity
![](https://boundo.com/logo-timeline/boundo/salesforce-2.svg)Salesforce
![](https://boundo.com/logo-timeline/boundo/zendesk.svg)Zendesk
![](https://boundo.com/logo-timeline/hubspot.svg)Hubspot
![](https://boundo.com/logo-timeline/boundo/salesforce-2.svg)Salesforce
![](https://boundo.com/logo-timeline/boundo/activecampaign-1.svg)ActiveCampaign
### CRM Integrations
Sync leads where you work
Boundo plays nicely with your CRM, automatically syncing leads and updating statuses.
![](https://boundo.com/linked-avatars/customer.jpg)![](https://boundo.com/linked-avatars/manager.jpg)
### AI Worker
Your Best SDR
Boundo is your best SDR, working 24/7 to generate leads and close deals. Boundo learns from your feedback and gets better over time.
### Inbox
Boundo is Your Inbox
Boundo is your inbox for all your mailboxes, allowing you to send and receive messages directly from Boundo.
## What everyone is saying
### Trusted by the world's best teams.
![](https://boundo.com/testimonials/clive.jpeg)
> ‚ÄúThe team behind boundo has nailed it - they have created a must-have solution for anyone serious about successful email outreach.‚Äù
Clive Jordan
Co-founder and CEO, Plannerly
![](https://boundo.com/testimonials/ron.jpeg)
> ‚ÄúBoundo is like an SDR without all the headache. I just set it up and it gets me meetings in just a few hours!‚Äù
Ron Fisher
CEO, Mesh
![](https://boundo.com/testimonials/jaison.jpeg)
> ‚ÄúAs a heavy-AI user, Boundo's platform and support is in a class of its own. Instead of robotic-sounding messages, we got natural outreach that resonated with our leads.‚Äù
Jaison George
Head of Growth, Neptyne
![](https://boundo.com/testimonials/prashant.jpeg)
> ‚ÄúIt used to take a week's worth of manual effort to reach out to 100s of leads in a personalised manner. Now it takes minutes with Boundo!‚Äù
Prashant Choudhary
Growth, Craze

generated_description:
Boundo is an innovative startup with a sharp mission: to harness generative AI to supercharge outbound sales and do it all on autopilot. Founded in 2022 and backed by Y Combinator‚Äôs S22 batch, the company is nestled in the tech-rich environment of San Francisco with a lean team of just two employees.

At its core, Boundo aims to automate the traditionally labor-intensive role of Sales Development Representatives (SDRs). You tell Boundo who your ideal customer profile (ICP) is, and it goes to work‚Äîfinding and reaching out to high-quality sales leads. It does this by crafting near-human-like outbound emails that have been statistically proven to convert well. This isn't just theoretical; Boundo uses its own platform for its sales efforts, demonstrating confidence in its capabilities.

With the goal of "10x outbound sales," Boundo is all about efficiency. It promises to save businesses up to $70,000 annually per SDR and claims to free up around 1,000 hours of work. The platform operates around the clock, allowing users to generate thousands of qualified leads in mere seconds by leveraging popular platforms like LinkedIn and email. Boundo also utilizes advanced deliverability technology to ensure that outreach efforts land in inboxes, not spam folders.

Beyond just lead generation, Boundo provides in-depth insights into engagement, tracking hot leads that are interacting with your content. Its AI-driven personalization ensures that potential clients feel like they‚Äôre receiving messages from a real person, not a bot.

Trust has been a significant theme in Boundo's early traction, with satisfied clients praising the platform as a game-changer for simplifying and improving the sales outreach process. 

For businesses looking to climb the sales ladder with a tech-savvy edge, Boundo stands out as an all-in-one tool that promises speed, efficiency, and a modern approach to lead generation and management. If you‚Äôre ready to scale your sales strategy, it might be worth your time to check out their offerings on [Boundo's website](https://boundo.com).
